</row>

</row>

---

The tip of this _+2 greater striking [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)_ is large and wickedly barbed, and the haft is inlaid with fine silver lines that run the length of the weapon. Wielded by specially trained [xulgath](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102) cavalry, _anchor spears_ are used to prevent the escape of gogiteths or other monsters capable of climbing or burrowing.
